## ConnectionChecker.doTypeChecks() method

Check whether this connection is compatible with another connection with respect to the value type system. E.g. square\_root("Hello") is not compatible.

**Signature:**

```typescript
doTypeChecks(a: Connection, b: Connection): boolean;
```

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the connections share a type.
